summary: Ever wanted to hear Mudcrab call you a mother****er? Or yell \"HOLY SH**\" on death? This is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------
      Tourettes Mudcrab
----------------------------------------

Ever wanted to hear Mudcrab call you a mother****er? Or yell \"HOLY SH**\" on death? This is the mod for you! I\'ve replaced many sounds of the common mudcrab with Tourettes Guy audio!

Done with many sound files, I may add more, and there are a couple spares already in there. If you want to switch out ANY sound file (not just Tourettes Guy\'s, but ANY sound file you want,) just drag it into the needed folder and rename it accordingly.
Example:
You want him to say \"You can go to Rolly Jolly Pirate\'s Donut place and take a two hour SH** for all I care!!\" when he dies, simply put the sound file into the \"death\" folder and rename it npc_mudcrab_death_(whatever number you need.) It\'s that simple!
INSTALLATION:
Simply extract the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim directory.
author: Kittez
